## utils.dom.measureFontMetrics() function

Measure a font's metrics. The height and baseline values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function measureFontMetrics(text: string, fontSize: string, fontWeight: string, fontFamily: string): {
    height: number;
    baseline: number;
};
```
